definition[0]: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work
example[1]: It was no longer financially feasible to keep the community centre open.
definition[1]: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and likely to work
example[2]: That may be the only feasible way of solving the problem.
example[3]: Powerful computers have made it feasible to search through millions of records at great speed.
